siteMetadata.name: Rajeshwar Rathi
siteMetadata.title: Rajeshwar Rathi | Machine Learning Engineer and Researcher
siteMetadata.about: I am a curious and motivated Machine Learning Researcher aiming to solve the social and ecological problems affecting humans and the environment. I expertise in Machine Learning algorithms and Deep Learning architectures, especially in Vision tasks such as image classification, object detection, segmentation, etc. My main priority is to make ML accessible to as many humans as possible and make even children understand the basics of ML. Though I love spending time on ML, I also work on software development to automate stuff.
siteMetadata.author: @rajeshwar_rathi
